title: Is there any difference between being spiritual and faith based on reality? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there any difference between being spiritual and faith based on reality? spir·it·u·al /ˈspiriCH(o͞o)əl/ Learn to pronounce adjective 1.relating to or affecting the human spirit or soul as opposed to material or physical things."I'm responsible for his spiritual welfare"Similar:nonmaterialinnerpsychicpsychicalpsychologicalincorporealintangibleotherworldlyunworldlyetherealtranscendentmysticmysticalnuminousmetaphysicalextramundaneimmaterialOpposite:physicalmaterialcorporealmundane2.relating to religion or religious belief."the tribe's spiritual leader"faith-based adjective affiliated with or based on religion or a religious group."a faith-based plan that bilked investors out of millions"re·al·i·ty /rēˈalədē/ Learn to pronounce noun 1.the world or the state of things as they actually exist, as opposed to an idealistic or notional idea of them."he refuses to face reality"Similar:the real worldreal lifeactualitytruthphysical existencecorporealitysubstantialitymaterialityOpposite:fantasy2.the state or quality of having existence or substance."youth, when death has no reality"So, basically, we can see that spiritual refers to that which is not real, but, reality refers to that which is real… and, faith based means based upon religious belief. So, to have something called faith, based upon reality, is not a thing. :D If you have evidence, you don’t need faith.

There is nothing spiritual or faith based. I am not attached, to know, at start little bit faith required to, just like a science student. Hence upnishads call it as Shraddha. Here Shraddha means nothing but concentration. Concentration of mind. Because dilluded mind can not realise the absolute truth. Here it is not a blind faith like religions belief and faith. hence if someone told, “ I believe that”, before sri Ramakrishna paramahansa, he used to call, Khot time”, means bogus or fake. if it’s not attached, it should be visible to me. Once seen, really “I am not attached, I am the independent, I am not the creator of anything, I am not had any karma, or not having any karma, I am the self, this creation is simply hanged to me, I am the self or Atman, I am not even point of geometry, triangles or vaginas not belonged to me, body not belongs to me, I never born, there was, there is, there will be no death for me”, now every thing you transcended and you became it.
